name: The Strangehood - The Pilot
description:
You find yourself in The Strangehoodnobody knows how they get here, but presumably monolithic architecture plays a part. Uncover a plot which threatens to destroy not only the weird world of The Strangehood but also adjacent dimensions and hyper-realms.

In The Strangehood you navigate a strange world and solve trippy puzzles on tiny planets and meet interesting people.

Inspired to classic adventure games, expressionist cinema, visionary art.

If you like it. Tell a friend. And support the concept on steam
